GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.51
GSD.description:
igb: fix a use-after-free issue in igb_clean_tx_ring

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit 2af944210dc23d43d8208dafac4df7be7e3c168b, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 9cbc948b5a20c9c054d9631099c0426c16da546b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: igb: fix a use-after-free issue in igb_clean_tx_ring
